name: Abio goes PewPew
description:
A game where you go PewPew!!!

FEATURES:

- 8 levels, the first one being a tutorial level

- 5 different enemies

- Interesting...pixel art graphics

- A terrible but original soundtrack :)

- Weird shooting mechanics

- And just an overall weird game lol

CONTROLS:

- WASD to move

- Space to jump

- Right click to shoot

- Esc to pause the game

CREDITS:

Everything was done by Abio
